description:
The error response.
 The following are the internal error codes thrown by this API when the request processing fails in Oracle Commerce Cloud:


|Error Code|Description|
|------------------|------------------|
|23025|If some internal error occurs while generating password for the specified email.|
|23026|If the user input is null or empty|
|23027|If email field is null or missing|
|23006|If invalid email address is entered.|
